inclusion.criterion: Patients attending a rehabilitation program in the Rehabilitation Hospital Revarte, Belgium
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Neurological, except stroke, and orthopaedic impairments influencing outcome measures
exclusion.label: unknown
not_met
exclusion.evidence: initial CT angiogram of head and neck reported no acute intracranial findings

exclusion.criterion: Pre-existing co-morbid conditions that may affect vision and somatosensory function
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 62-year-old African-American man with left upper and lower extremity weakness, dark visual spot in right eye, facial numbness, facial drop and slurred speech. Hypertension, hyperlipidemia and hypothyroidism; smokes 1 pack per day for 40 years.
